graphql.query:
mutation {
    receiveAsset(assetUniqueId: "asset3", description: "receiveAsset3", acquisitionDate: "2019-07-03", location: "loc3", manufacturer: "make3", vendor: "vendor3", model: "model3", serialNum: "sn3", orgId: "org3") {
        assetUniqueId
        description
        acquisitionDate
        purchasePrice
        location
        manufacturer
        vendor
        model
        serialNum
        orgId
    }
}

mutation {
    installAsset(assetUniqueId: "asset3", description: "installAsset3", acquisitionDate: "2019-07-03", location: "loc3", manufacturer: "make3", vendor: "vendor3", model: "model3", serialNum: "sn3", orgId: "org3", installDate: "2019-07-13") {
        assetUniqueId
        description
        acquisitionDate
        purchasePrice
        location
        manufacturer
        vendor
        model
        serialNum
        orgId
        installDate
    }
}

mutation {
    receiveInvoice(assetUniqueId: "asset3", description: "receiveInvoice3", location: "loc3", invoiceDate: "2019-07-23", orgId: "org3", invoicePrice: 30000, vendor: "vendor3") {
        assetUniqueId
        description
        acquisitionDate
        purchasePrice
        location
        manufacturer
        vendor
        model
        serialNum
        orgId
        installDate
        invoiceDate
        invoicePrice
    }
}

mutation {
    updateAsset(assetUniqueId: "asset3", description: "updateAsset3", purchasePrice: 30000, location: "loc3", model: "model3", orgId: "org3", installDate: "2019-07-13", invoiceDate: "2019-07-23", netBookValue: 35000, serialNum: "sn3") {
        assetUniqueId
        description
        acquisitionDate
        purchasePrice
        location
        manufacturer
        vendor
        model
        serialNum
        orgId
        installDate
        invoiceDate
        invoicePrice
        netBookValue
    }
}

{
    queryAsset(assetUniqueId: "asset3") {
        assetUniqueId
        description
        acquisitionDate
        purchasePrice
        location
        manufacturer
        vendor
        model
        serialNum
        orgId
        installDate
        invoiceDate
        invoicePrice
        netBookValue
    }
}
